description: The owner of the procurement is seeking to acquire yellow and white highway traffic paint for the Ministry of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement ## Highway Traffic Paint

## Tender Information

* Title: Highway Traffic Paint
* Solicitation Number: WS4699889447
* Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET
* Publication Date: July 23, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired

## Contract Information

* Unspsc: 31211500
* Unspsc Description: Paints and primers
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Request for Proposal

Canada is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide 7,000 liters of yellow highway traffic paint and 7,000 liters of white highway traffic paint to Parks Canada. The successful contractor will be required to deliver the paint to the designated location.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on price. The lowest priced bid will be selected.

## Bids Submission

Bids must be submitted electronically through the SAP Ariba platform. All necessary documents, including the detailed Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments, are available on the platform. To access the documents, contractors must be logged into their SAP Ariba account and have completed their Government of Canada profile.

## Contact Information

For any inquiry or request for a debriefing on the bid results, please contact Genevieve Petten, Contracting Authority at:
genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notes

Please note that this tender announcement has expired, and the solicitation number and closing date are available for historical reference only.

I made sure to maintain the structure and important details of the original entry while rephrasing it in a more professional manner, avoiding unnecessary information, and respecting the 400-word limit. Let me know if you need further assistance.
